DOC.brief_title: Effect Brief-tele Support Attendance Physiotherapy Sessions
DOC.detailed_description: Aims : The research aim assess impact brief telephone call patient pelvic floor problem wait list physiotherapy treatment . Non-attendance session currently run 50 % , step reduce would beneficial patient health NHS efficiency . Participants Recruitment : Consecutive patient refer physiotherapy treatment pelvic floor dysfunction ask would like participate study . The initial approach make letter , give information study , make clear treatment depend participation study . Patients wait list physiotherapy treatment pelvic floor dysfunction randomly divide three group : - group get telephone call invitation letter send - group get telephone call invitation letter send - group receive telephone call . The phone call brief 5-10 minute call , semi-structured . It remind patient appointment time , outline treatment involve highlight potential benefit drawback , allow patient ask question treatment .
DOC.criteria: Women wait list pelvic floor dysfunction 18 year old
